quest.name: Succulent Secretions
journal:
î‚¾ Quest Sync
Lamon has a job to do, and he's hoping you will do it for him.
objectives: Use the brass siphon on the giant succulent.
Deliver the sweet-smelling succulent secretions to Lamon.

dialogue.name: LAMON
dialogue.text: Looking for work, by any chance?

dialogue.name: LAMON
dialogue.text: I'm supposed to be draining water out of plants with these siphons, but I could use some help.

dialogue.name: LAMON
dialogue.text: As you've probably noticed, the whole area is lousy with all sorts of hostile creatures, which means this is not a job for the faint of heart.

dialogue.name: LAMON
dialogue.text: I'd be fine if siphoning the water didn't take so long. While I'm waiting, I'm easy prey. If you could go in my place, I'll see that you're properly rewarded.

dialogue.name: LAMON
dialogue.text: You need eyes in the back of your head to do this job. Seems like you know how to handle yourself, though.

dialogue.name: LAMON
dialogue.text: Very impressive! Are you sure you haven't done this before?

dialogue.name: LAMON
dialogue.text: Now, you might be wondering why we'd go through the effort of siphoning from plants. There are easier ways to get water, after all. Well, this stuff has a certain sweetness that comes in handy when making medicines.

dialogue.name: LAMON
dialogue.text: They tend to taste quite bitter, so this takes the edge off. Not that it makes the treatments any more effective, but the patients certainly seem to appreciate it. You have our thanks.
